FOREIGN_TRANSFER.OVER_BALANCE: Must be less than account balance
FOREIGN_TRANSFER.TRANS_ALERT: Notes: banking hours passed, this pen will be the next business day trading.
FOREIGN_TRANSFER.REGET_EXCHANGE_RATE: Exchange rate has expired, whether to re-acquire the new exchange rate, or leave the currency exchange function.
FOREIGN_TRANSFER.CONFIRM_CONTENT: Handover function obtains a new exchange rate, confirming whether to give up the current exchange rate?
FOREIGN_TRANSFER.BACK_TO_EDIT: Exchange rate has expired, whether to return the edit page, or leave the currency exchange function.
FOREIGN_TRANSFER.WARNING: 提醒您!!如果當日您在本行或其他網路平台或分行櫃檯，結匯金額累計得等值新臺幣50萬元時，本行將以買、賣匯水單媒體資料報送中央銀行，並以該媒體資料視同申報義務人向中央銀行申報。
